TopicTitle: Welcome to Scenes we'd like to see

Articles.Content:
This forum game is for everyone. I call out an idea for a scenario we'd love to see and the posters come in with their suggestions. After 1 week or 30 posts (Whichever comes first) anyone may post their own scenario, then a week or 30 later, another poster with a scenario and so on. Please try to wait until three other scenarios have been posted before you post another one.

So, the first subject is:

Bad things to hear over an airplane's intercom
Was that the other engine? Oh crap...
"I regret to inform you that we are now out of snacks."
"Ooops... so that's what that button does....."

"This is the captain speaking. I have some good news and some bad news. The good news is that we will be landing shortly. The bad news is that it will be a crash landing. Please fasten your seatbelts and brace for impact."
